sentences.en: The bathroom, with its spartan pre-war facilities, is positively arctic.
sentences.cn: 这个有简陋战前设施的浴室实在冷极了。

sentences.en: The novel captures the feeling of the pre-war period to a T.
sentences.cn: 这部小说对战前时期的情怀把握得恰到好处。

sentences.en: A new German currency was pegged to gold at its pre-war rate.
sentences.cn: 新的德国货币以战前的兑换比例与黄金挂上了钩。
